name: snowrunner-xml-editor-desktop
description: Allows you to visually edit the game's XML files.

scripts.build: node ./build_scripts/preBuild.js && npm run package-prod && node ./build_scripts/postBuild.js x32
scripts.build-x64: node ./build_scripts/preBuild.js && npm run package-prod-x64 && node ./build_scripts/postBuild.js x64
scripts.package-prod: npm run set-arch-x32 && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge package --platform=win32 --arch=ia32
scripts.package-prod-x64: npm run set-arch-x64 && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge package --platform=win32 --arch=x64
